name: Time is money (Desktoy)
description:
In Time is Money, you play as a robot cat burgler (though not quite as subtle) 
Blasting your way through Museum walls and riding time back and forth through the collapse to steal the art and make your great escape.
The game relies on the emergent nature of physics destruction to create a dynamic platformer as you jump through the rubble.

Controls:
WASD to Move
Mouse to look around
Q and E to move time forwards and backwards
Spacebar to jump
Left Mouse button to loot or interact with world objects
F / P / ESC to pause

If you are getting performance drops, try adjusting the physics sim time in the options menu, 0% is the most CPU intensive and 100% slows the simulation of distant rubble and should alleviate any hitches.

A game made by
Alina  - Art, UI, Game Design
Charlie - Art, 3D Models, Game Design
Damian - Audio
Ross - 3D Models, Game Design,  Code
Sam -  3D Models, Game Design, Code

Content made before the jam : Main menu code and settings menu.
Skyboxes from HDRIhaven.com
